{{also|军团}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=军团}}

===Etymology===
An {{zh-compound|軍|團}}, the basic [[subdivision]] of an army.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=jūntuán
|c=gwan1 tyun4
|mn=kun-thoân
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|military}} [[corps]]
# [[legion]]

====Usage notes====
{{sense|military}} Under the [[w:National Revolutionary Army|National Revolutionary Army]] (NRA), a corps was composed of two or three [[division]]s ([[整編師]] / [[編制師]]), and some independent [[companies]] ([[連]]), [[regiment]]s ([[團]]) and [[brigade]]s ([[旅]]). The corps was the basic tactical unit of the NRA. In turn, it could be combined with other corps to make an [[army]] ([[軍]]), route army ([[路軍]]), army group ([[集團軍]]), army corps ([[兵團]]) (front), military region ([[軍區]]) (theatre).
